SocialNetworkService - Class in Service
 
SocialNetworkService() - Constructor for class Service.SocialNetworkService
 
Status - Enum in Model
There are 4 Status defined 0 - Register, for Future use, status before getting email confirmation upon registration 1 - Active, used upon registration and upon reActivation -1 - Disable, used upon deActivation -2 - Terminated, for Future use, to terminate user if user perform illegal activities
